settings.title: Order-Related Inquiries
settings.answer: Please e-mail orders@ pemulis.cool for any questions and concerns related to an active order.

settings.title: Gallery Exhibition Inquiries
settings.answer: We are currently accepting submissions for 2025 gallery exhibitions. Please send examples of past and current work, artist statement, bio, etc to submissions @pemulis.cool

settings.title: Press Inquiries
settings.answer: Please send all press inquires to press @pemulis.cool.

settings.title: Merchandising Inquiries
settings.answer: Please send all submissions for merchandising or selling product/brands at Pemulis to merchandising @pemulis.cool
